item.title: Installing My Server Fully Remotely
item.description: I run a small tower server in my house to provide services that I use for software development, recently CentOS-8-Stream reached end of life. Since this server distribution doesn’t support in-place updates, updating requires reinstalling with a new version of the CentOS-9-Stream. This post documents the challenges that I hit along the way.
